description.value:
Spirit Drum (Fetish)

Creation Cost: 10 Gnosis

A great drum stretched with spirit-hide.

Effect: As an action, beat the drum for up to 1 minute. While the drum is played:

  • Allies within 30 feet gain advantage on saving throws against fear and charm
  • Allies gain advantage on their next Gnosis Roll

Requires concentration (as if concentrating on a spell). Usable once per long rest.

effects.name: Spirit Drum (Playing)
effects.description: You are beating the Spirit Drum (concentration). For up to 1 minute: allies within 30 feet gain advantage on saving throws against fear and charm; allies gain advantage on their next Gnosis Roll. Apply those benefits manually when relevant. If you lose concentration, this effect ends.
